anya-e0105n26:1_1: Visuddhimaggo viya sīlasamādhipaññānaṁ visuṁ visuṁ vibhajitvā dīpako eko paṭipattigantho.
anya-e0105n26:2_0: ‘‘Sīlaṁ samādhi paññā ca, vimutti ca anuttarā;
anya-e0105n26:3_0: Anubuddhā ime dhammā, gotamena yasassinā’’ti dī. ni. 2.186; a. ni. 4.1 –
anya-e0105n26:4_0: Imaṁ gāthaṁ paṭhamaṁ dassetvā tadatthavaṇṇanāvasena sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiyo visuṁ visuṁ vibhajitvā dīpitā.
anya-e0105n26:4_1: So pana gantho idāni cinaraṭṭheyeva diṭṭho,
anya-e0105n26:4_2: cinabhāsāya ca parivattito (1048-bu-va) saṅghapālena nāma bhikkhunā.
anya-e0105n26:4_3: Kena pana so kuto ca tattha ānītoti na pākaṭametaṁ.
anya-e0105n26:4_4: Tassa pana saṅghapālassa ācariyo guṇabhadro nāma mahāyāniko bhikkhu majjhimaindiyadesiko,
anya-e0105n26:4_5: so indiyaraṭṭhato cinaraṭṭhaṁ gacchanto paṭhamaṁ sīhaḷadīpaṁ gantvā tato (978-bu-va) cinaraṭṭhaṁ gato.
anya-e0105n26:4_6: Tadā so tena ānīto bhaveyya vimuttimagga,
anya-e0105n26:5_0: Tasmiñhi vimuttimagge pubbāciṇṇanidānadassanaṁ dhātunidānadassanañca yatheva visuddhimagge ekaccevādo,
anya-e0105n26:5_6: vātādhiko rāgacarito’’ti tiṇṇampi rāgadosamohānaṁ dosaniyamo vutto.
anya-e0105n26:5_7: Ācariyabuddhaghosena diṭṭhavimuttimaggapotthake pana ‘‘pittādhiko dosacarito’’ti pāṭho ūno bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n26:6_0: Aññānipi bahūni visuddhimagge paṭikkhittāni tattha vimuttimagge gahetabbabhāvena dissanti. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0105n26:7_2: sītalattho sīlatthoti evamādināpi nayenettha atthaṁ vaṇṇayantī’’ti paṭikkhitto atthopi tattha gahetabbabhāvena dissati.
anya-e0105n26:8_3: asantaṁ kassa dhunanato dhutaṅgaṁ nāma bhavissati,
anya-e0105n26:8_4: dhutaguṇe samādāya vattatīti vacanavirodhopi ca nesaṁ āpajjati,
anya-e0105n26:8_5: tasmā taṁ na gahetabba’’nti paṭikkhittaṁ paññattidhutaṅgampi tattha dissati.
anya-e0105n26:8_7: te hi dhutaṅgaṁ nāma paññattīti vadantī’’ti vaṇṇitaṁ.
anya-e0105n26:9_3: sampahaṁsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇāti evameke vaṇṇayantī’’tiādinā paṭikkhittaekevādopi tattha dissati.
anya-e0105n26:10_1: 80-piṭṭhe) ‘‘balarūpaṁ sambhavarūpaṁ jātirūpaṁ rogarūpaṁ ekaccānaṁ matena middharūpa’’nti evaṁ aññānipi
anya-e0105n26:10_2: rūpāni āharitvā porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṁ tesaṁ paṭikkhittabhāvo pakāsito.
anya-e0105n26:10_6: atha kho middharūpassa atthibhāvopi ‘‘middhaṁ nāma tividhaṁ āhārajaṁ utujaṁ cittajañcāti.
anya-e0105n26:10_8: sesā pana dve arahatopi bhaveyyu’’ntiādinā sādhito.
anya-e0105n26:11_0: Ettāvatā ca vimuttimagge visuddhimaggena asamānatthānaṁ vuttabhāvo ca abhayagirivāsīhi tassa ganthassa paṭiggahitabhāvo ca sakkā ñātuṁ.
anya-e0105n26:11_1: Aññānipi pana īdisāni asamānavacanāni bahūni tattha saṁvijjantiyeva,
anya-e0105n26:11_2: tāni pana sabbāni na sakkā idha dassetuṁ.
anya-e0105n26:12_0: Yebhuyyena panassa karaṇappakāro visuddhimaggassa viya hoti.
anya-e0105n26:12_1: Yā yā hi pāḷi abhidhammavibhaṅgato vā paṭisambhidāmaggato vā aññasuttantehi vā ānetvā sādhakabhāvena visuddhimagge dassiyati,
anya-e0105n26:12_2: tatthapi sā sā pāḷi yebhuyyena dissateva.
anya-e0105n26:13_1: 47-piṭṭhe) ‘‘pañca sīlāni pāṇātipātassa pahānaṁ sīla’’ntiādikā paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷi dassitā,
anya-e0105n26:14_2: vicāro vicikicchāyā’’ti vacanaṁ peṭake vuttanti dassitaṁ,
anya-e0105n26:14_3: tañca tatthapi tatheva dassetvā ‘‘tipeṭake vutta’’nti niddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0105n26:14_4: Tipeṭaketi nāmañca peṭakopadesameva sandhāya vuttaṁ bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n26:14_5: Tattha hi vivicceva kāmehīti pāṭhasaṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘alobhassa pāripūriyā kāmehi viveko sampajjati, adosassa.
anya-e0105n26:14_6: Amohassa pāripūriyā akusalehi dhammehi viveko sampajjatī’’ti pāṭhassa tipeṭake vuttabhāvo dassito.
anya-e0105n26:14_7: So ca pāṭho peṭakopadese (262-piṭṭhe) ‘‘tattha alobhassa pāripūriyā vivitto hoti kāmehī’’tiādinā dissati.
anya-e0105n26:15_1: 258-piṭṭhe) ‘‘ayampi kho bhikkhave ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito’’tiādikā pāḷi mahāvaggasaṁyuttakato ānetvā dassitā,
anya-e0105n26:17_1: 69-piṭṭhe) ‘‘katamā cintāmayā paññā’’tiādikā ca pāḷi ‘‘tattha katamaṁ āyakosalla’’ntiādikā ca pāḷi (2,
anya-e0105n26:17_2: 71-piṭṭhe) ‘‘dukkhe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā’’tiādikā ca pāḷi abhidhammavibhaṅgato ānetvā dassitā,
anya-e0105n26:17_4: Sabbāpi ca tattha vuttā ekavidhaduvidhādipaññāpabhedakathā visuddhimagge vuttakathāya yebhuyyena samānāyeva.
anya-e0105n26:19_0: Parittaṁ sukhumaṁ etaṁ, ūkāsirasamūpama’’nti visuddhi. 2.436; dha. sa. aṭṭha. 596 –
anya-e0105n26:20_0: Ayampi gāthā vimuttimaggepi āyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitabhāveneva dassitā.
anya-e0105n26:20_1: Ūkāsirasamūpamanti padaṁ pana ūkāsamūpamanti tattha dissati,
anya-e0105n26:21_0: Catūsu saccesu visuddhimagge viya vacanatthato lakkhaṇato anūnādhikato kamato antogadhānaṁ pabhedato upamāto ca vinicchayo dassito,
anya-e0105n26:22_1: 242-245) sammasanañāṇakathāyaṁ pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ atītādiekādasavidhena ca aniccādilakkhaṇattayena ca visuṁ visuṁ sammasananayo dassito,
anya-e0105n26:22_3: Cakkhādijarāmaraṇapariyosānesu pana dhammesu dhammavicārapariyosānānaṁ saṭṭhiyā eva dhammānaṁ aniccādilakkhaṇattayena sammasananayo tattha dassito.
anya-e0105n26:23_4: ‘‘na sakena balena jāyare’’tiādikā cha gāthāyo ca vimuttimagge bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇakathāyaṁ dassitā.
anya-e0105n26:24_1: 261-2-piṭṭhesu) arūpasattakesu ariyavaṁsakathānayena vutto kalāpato ca yamakato ca sammasananayo vimuttimagge
anya-e0105n26:25_0: Vimuttimagge buddhānussatikathāyaṁ lokavidūti padassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṁ sattalokasaṅkhāralokavasena dveyeva lokā dassitā,
anya-e0105n26:26_0: Ettāvatā ca vimuttimaggo nāma gantho kīdisoti sakkā anuminituṁ.
anya-e0105n26:26_1: So pana yathā na mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ gantho hoti,
anya-e0105n26:26_2: evaṁ mahāyānikānampi na hotiyeva theravādapiṭakameva nissāya katabhāvato.
anya-e0105n26:26_3: Yasmā pana tattha na kiñcipi sīhaḷadīpikaṁ nāmaṁ vā theravādo vā dissati,
anya-e0105n26:26_4: tasmā so sīhaḷadīpe kataganthopi na hoti.
anya-e0105n26:26_5: Indiyaraṭṭhikaṁ pana nāmañca vohāro ca tattha bahūsu ṭhānesu dissati,
anya-e0105n26:26_7: Yasmā cassa peṭakopadesaṁ nissitabhāvo bahūsu ṭhānesu dissati,
anya-e0105n26:26_9: arahatopi tassa atthibhāvo ca tameva nissāya dassīyati,
anya-e0105n26:26_10: paṭisambhidāmaggagaṇṭhipade ca peṭaketi padassa paṭi. ma. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n26:26_11: 1.1.36 atthavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘suttantapiṭakatthāya aṭṭhakathā peṭakaṁ mahisāsakānaṁ gantho’’ti vaṇṇito.
anya-e0105n26:26_12: Tasmā eso vimuttimaggo mahisāsakanikāyikena kato bhaveyyāti amhākaṁ mati.
